item.description:
Partner workout day! Let’s call this a loop within loop workout!

Warmup,

For ($x = 1,Â  $x<=7, $x++) {

  • $x Burpee(s) + Within each Burpee [For ($y = 1,Â  $y<=$x,Â  $y++) { $y Knee-to-elbow(s) }]
  • $x lying-down-standing-up(s) + Right after lying down [For ($z = 1,Â  $z<=$x,Â  $z++) { $z Ab-cycle(s) }]
  • Wait for partner to finish similar workout

} x As quickly as possible

Cool-down

Partner workout day! Let’s call this a loop within loop workout!

Warmup,

For ($x = 1,Â  $x<=7, $x++) {

  • $x Burpee(s) + Within each Burpee [For ($y = 1,Â  $y<=$x,Â  $y++) { $y Knee-to-elbow(s) }]
  • $x lying-down-standing-up(s) + Right after lying down [For ($z = 1,Â  $z<=$x,Â  $z++) { $z Ab-cycle(s) }]

} x As quickly as possible
